words.def: an electrical device that provides a path for electrical current to flow
a person who is professionally engaged in the analysis and interpretation of works of art
of or related to citric acid
of or relating to a seizure or convulsion
in or relating to or obtained from urine
marked by rude or peremptory shortness
A grade or class of wine; as, premier cru.
an inferior dog or one of mixed breed
a local and habitual twitching especially in the face
A New Zealand  honeyeater, Prosthemadera novaeseelandiae .
a groove or furrow (especially one in soft earth caused by wheels)
a light strong grey lustrous corrosion-resistant metallic element used in strong lightweight alloys (as for airplane parts)
the local time at the 0 meridian passing through Greenwich, England
the branch of engineering that deals with the use of computers and telecommunications to retrieve and store and transmit information
